thread.title_full: Video: Trailer for Sherlock episode shot in Bath starring...

author: LJGillespie
title: Video: Trailer for Sherlock episode shot in Bath starring...
text:
The trailer for the next installment of Sherlock has been released - but can you spot Bath? 
The episode, which is due to be shown over Christmas, was filmed earlier this year. 
The one-off story will see Holmes and his sidekick Watson return to the Victorian era. 
Benedict Cumberbatch and Martin Freeman were seen filming the episode in locations across the West Country including Bath. Related content
